activities:
Sirius XM has engaged with a UK company to provide assistance in providing a personalized listening experience on Siriux XM Internet Radio where the customer may interact with their device to set weighted listening preferences.
In addition, Sirius XM Connected Vehicle Services, Inc. (SXM CVS) collects certain personal information about its employees in the European Economic Area (EEA). SXM CVS processes sensitive information about the company's employees to the extent necessary or appropriate for compliance with relevant legal or contractual obligations, including managing attendance and employee records.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Information Security, Privacy and Compliance
